name: Qazar
description:
Qazar

A Space Shooter game, made for study how to programming on Construct 3. 
All Sprites like: Spaceships, Asteroids, Menu Screen. Was made by the Artist Rodolfo Rubens. Some of then, are not available in the first version of the game. Please wait till the next version of the game.

How to play?

Use de direction keys to move your Spaceship like you were driving a car. Yes! To accelerate press "Up", "Down" to deccelerate, and "Right" or "Left" to give your Spaceship a direction to move. The more you destroy the asteroids the faster they go. Press "Z" - To shoot

The game, was inspired on "Asteroids". 
The Sound effects, was download at freesound.org website.
